ai_answer:
Top recommendation: Nice, France

Alternates (in order): Mallorca (Spain), Palermo (Italy)
ai_explanation:
The system ranks destinations using a single decision rule that combines user preferences (relaxation and travel convenience) into the formula:
Score = 0.7 × relaxation_rating + 0.3 × max(0, (6 – travel_time) / 6)

Decision Process:

  • Each location is assigned a relaxation rating (0–1) and a travel time from Berlin, Germany.
  • The formula applies 70% weight to relaxation and 30% to travel time (capped at 6 hours).
  • The destination with the highest score is selected.

Outcome:

Nice scores approximately 0.83 (0.63 on relaxation and 0.2 for travel time), based on high relaxation and a 2-hour distance from Berlin by flight.
Alternatives like Mallorca or Palermo score around 0.8, so Nice is preferred.
